# Seven Shadows Gate

Stage: [OATH]
Decision: [BLOCK]
Provider/Event: github / pull_request_review
Selected Domains: Security, Access
Targets Scanned: 2
Highest AI Score: 0.612

## Domain Decisions

[BLOCK] Security   score=58.0
[BLOCK] Access     score=41.0

## Findings

- [BLOCK] [Security] SHADOW_SECURITY_TRUST_BOUNDARY: Auth/trust-boundary regression signal detected.
  Remediation: Enforce server-side authorization and explicit trust boundaries on sensitive routes.
- [BLOCK] [Access] SHADOW_ACCESS_MISSING_ARIA_LABEL: Accessibility issue: interactive controls appear unlabeled for assistive technology.
  Remediation: Add appropriate accessible names (e.g., aria-label or linked label text) to interactive controls.
